attributes.action: stop the distribution of monies given to failing companies and givie this money to the British voting public, who would then puchase/invest cash into the whole economy, promoting real ecomonic growth nationally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take a dying flower(the car industry). Don't spend a billion in trying to cultivate a withering blossom?
Cut a dead head off and "feed the roots"  promoting new growth.
Give each British family/home owner a lump sum ie £20000. Then people will be in a position to spend this money on a new car,a holiday,home improvements. 
If individuals did not want to spend they would invest monies in struggling banks,paying their home loans or credit cards. Improving wealth and productivity of all industries and the health of all involved. 
Some would be on a mission to increase consumer confidence in all retail areas as families would become confident to shop. In spending and investing in this way new jobs would be created, no redundencies. The knock on effect of a cash injection would be huge. All will benefit from a new wealth within. 
    "A money for all people".
This is not rocket science, signatories will evidence this fact. 
Playing with the economy is a serious game that effects everyone so do something about it, make a difference.
Quote..."C'mon Rodney don't be a plonker,you know it makes sense!"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
